snippet.textDisplay: "These are called settlers" "Some moved in because the housing was cheap" Please let us be honest. They didn't "settle" or "make their own houses", they occupied them.
snippet.textOriginal: "These are called settlers" "Some moved in because the housing was cheap" Please let us be honest. They didn't "settle" or "make their own houses", they occupied them.

snippet.textDisplay:
You shouldn't spread such falsehoods. The houses in Jerusalem that the Arabs accuse the Jews of "occupying" or "stealing", legally belonged to the Jews, who were forced to flee when East Jerusalem was captured by Jordan, at which point those houses were illegally occupied by Arabs, so when Israel re-acquired control over East Jerusalem, the legal owners were given possession of their own homes back, which involved evicting the illegal squatters.

Similarly, in the West Bank, the Israelis are building their own communities, not evicting Arabs and moving into the Arabs' houses.

snippet.textDisplay:
Look at the entire history of the region... at least 3,000 years back. The Jews are the only people to have ever had a sovereign country in that land, and between the ancient kingdom and the modern state of Israel, the land has been owned by almost everyone else, but was never at any time a state of "Palestine". It was always a territory owned by a foreign power in all the time between Israel's past kingdom and its current Democratic state. The British gave the jews permission to return after WW2, and the Jews returned by first buying large amounts of land from landowners who wanted the money more than the land, and then the Jews moved onto that land they now owned. Immediately afterward, Arabs who'd never had any legal claim to the land owned by the Jews, launched illegal wars against the Jews, forcing the Israel to push back the aggressors to establish defensible borders, which is a legal acquisition of land under the international laws of war.

So Britain is not to blame. The Islamist death-cults like Hamas, and those who support them are to blame. The rest of the Arabs are victims of the aforementioned Islamist death-cults, who use them as human shields, and steal the international aid intended for these civilians.

snippet.textDisplay: So when was Palestine actually Palestine? Following The Great War?
snippet.textOriginal: So when was Palestine actually Palestine? Following The Great War?

snippet.textDisplay: There never was a state of "Palestine".  The Romans applied the name to the territory as an insult to the Jews, and an attempt to erase Israel from history, but neither the Romans, nor any empire that captured the land thereafter ever attempted to create anything resembling a state of "Palestine", even when the land was under Arab rule.

snippet.textDisplay: It's not arbitrary.  The land of Israel is the only location on the whole of the Earth where the Jews ever had a country of their own, and it's unique in that in all of recorded history, that land has never had any other sovereign country there except for that of the Jews.  No empire who ever captured that land ever created a country there.  It is the Jews' ancestral homeland.  They have significant historical and religious ties to that land.
